messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: There are lots of people withouth maxed suit sensors, fix this please

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Assisstant, clown, viro and chaplain, if you do not max your suit sensor you are not our responsibility if you die

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: If you want an enjoyable shift listen to kelpy G's smooth jazz

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Space Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Massive bluespace anomaly detected en route to Space Station 13. Brace for impact.
